name: The Bakery Game: Yummy Smash
description:
Match Yummy Sweets to bake delicious cakes and other tasty desserts.

Chef Sarah loves baking. She dreams of opening her own bakery.

To achieve her dream, she needs to travel the world and learn various baking recipes and secrets.

Have fun COMPLETELY FREE by helping Sarah on her way to success.

Over 200 challenging levels of never-ending fun

Use powerful boosters, make even bigger combo!

Cook awesome healthy recipes using fruits, chocolate, vanilla, jelly and more.

Prepare many delicious desserts from chocolate cherry cake to pink glazed donut, to strawberry jelly, blueberry cupcakes, vanilla muffins, Peanut Butter Cookies, tasty pancakes, blackberry pie, cheesecake, wedding cake or birthday cake.

We even have vegan food options.

Make sure you deliver your tasty desserts like croissant, marshmallow, candy, ice cream, macaron, waffle or cream filled biscuits to your customers in time.

Collect ingredients by matching at least 3 of the same, smash chocolate and jelly and use them in your bakery!

Incredibly addictive puzzles for kids and adults.

Download free now!

FEATURES:
- 200+ unique levels with challenging obstacles
- Amazing collection of powerups & combos
- Delicious graphics & adorable animations
- Addicting gameplay & rewarding progress

PLUS:
- Connect to Facebook!
- Special rewards & cooking events!
- New content being added all the time!

The Baking Game is free to play, but you can choose to pay real money for some extra items.
